genAI.basePrompt:
<|begin_of_text|>
                            <|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>
                            You are a Professional Summarizer and Commentator. 
                            Your task is to evaluate the relevance of a resume profile to a given job description. 
                            Provide a summary of the match.
                            Ensure accuracy and avoid any misleading or incorrect information.

                            Follow these instructions:

                            1. Read the Job Description and Resume Profile sections separately and carefully.
                            2. Pay close attention to the requirements and qualifications listed in the job description.
                            3. Compare these with the information provided in the resume profile.
                            4. Provide a clear and concise summary of how well the resume matches the job requirements under 300 words.
                            5. Only evaluate if the resume profile contains basic matching information.
                            6. Do not Provide score or any metrics for the match.
                            6. Limit the response to 300 words.
                            7. job description will be inside of <job description> and </job description> tags.
                            8. resume will be inside of <resume> and </resume> tags.
                            <|eot_id|>
                            <|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>
                           <job description> ** Job Description ** 
 *Location:*
   White,GA 30184,USA

*Years Of Experience*: 0-50 Years

Required Skills:
   Quality Control
   meet quality
   quality standards
   safety and quality
   Strong attention to detail
   Team - oriented
   ability to work well

Preferred Skills:
   manufacturing processes
   perform inspections
   perform visual inspections
   Conduct visual inspections
   compliance
   assembly
   production lines
   ensure productivity



TRC Talent is Hiring Quality Technician in White, GA

Job Summary:
TRC Talent is seeking a dedicated and detail-oriented Quality Control Technician to join our team in Cartersville. The FQC Technician will play a crucial role in ensuring that all final assembly products meet high-quality standards before they are delivered to our customers. This position requires a keen eye for detail, the ability to perform visual inspections, and the capacity to work in a fast-paced manufacturing environment.

Key Responsibilities:
Conduct visual inspections to verify product compliance with established quality standards.Identify and reject products that do not meet quality specifications.Monitor production lines to ensure productivity and quality goals are consistently met.Accurately document inspection results, contributing to final product grading.Report any quality issues that require escalation to the Quality Technician or line supervisor.Ensure the production of high-quality products with minimal defects.Monitor and adjust equipment settings as necessary, escalating deviations to the appropriate team.Support fellow operators during breaks and provide coverage for other work areas when needed.Adhere strictly to standardized work procedures, SOPs, and work instructions.Follow company policies and procedures to maintain safety and quality standards.Perform other duties and special projects as assigned by management.

Required Qualifications:
High school diploma or equivalent.Basic understanding of manufacturing processes and quality control procedures.Ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment.Strong attention to detail with the ability to analyze data and perform inspections for extended periods.Ability to remain flexible and adapt to changing priorities.Ability to work irregular hours, including weekends and nights, as needed.Team-oriented with the ability to work well under pressure.

Physical Requirements:
Ability to lift up to 50 pounds without restriction.Ability to stand and remain on feet for up to 12 hours per shift. </job description>

<|eot_id|>
<|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|><resume> ** Resume ** 
 
Pratik Gaurav
+91-7004029399 pratik.gaurav@maprecruit.ai </resume>

<|eot_id|>
<|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>
genAI.matchSummary:
The resume provided does not contain any relevant information or qualifications related to the job description of a Quality Technician. The job description emphasizes the need for specific skills such as quality control, attention to detail, the ability to perform visual inspections, and experience in a manufacturing environment. Additionally, it calls for a high school diploma or equivalent and the ability to work in a fast-paced setting.

However, the resume only includes the name and contact information of the candidate, Pratik Gaurav, without any details on education, experience, or relevant skills. As a result, there is no basis for evaluating the match between the resume and the job requirements. 

In summary, the resume does not meet the basic matching information necessary for the Quality Technician position, as it lacks any content that addresses the qualifications or requirements outlined in the job description.
